title: A relation of the last words and departure of that antient and honourable woman Loveday Hambly of Trigangeeues, in the parish of Austell in the County of Cornwal. With farther testimonies concerning her life and conversation.
author: Hambly, Loveday, 1603 or 4-1682.
publicationStmtPublisher: printed by John Gain, living in the Upper Moor-Fields, near the Flying-Horse,
